sentences.english: The disappointments of life can knock us down.
sentences.chinese: 生活中种种不如意真的可以打倒我们。

sentences.english: All sorts of commonly-used technologies for controlling Cr-containing wastewater are presented .
sentences.chinese: 介绍目前比较常用的含铬废水的种种治理技术。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the enterprise-oriented social partnership is held back by various factors.
sentences.chinese: 其实，以企业为主导的社会伙伴关系面对种种的限制。

sentences.english: Yet from all these, the unique characteristics of Yuan's Ci scintillate.
sentences.chinese: 凡此种种，都体现了遗山词的独特性。

sentences.english: Their whole political life has been about a rough and tumble campaign, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 他们的整个政治生活中一直面临着种种造谣中伤。

sentences.english: These developments culminated in the works of J. Bach and G. Handel .
sentences.chinese: 这一时期的种种进展在巴赫和亨德尔时达到了顶峰。

sentences.english: None of the claims about the Prince were ever proven and no rumours were substantiated.
sentences.chinese: 上述对亲王的种种断言及风言风语都没有得到证实。

sentences.english: Add justice to the fast-flung round of human endeavor and you have civilization.
sentences.chinese: 人类所做的种种努力之中添公正便成其为文明。

sentences.english: There is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
sentences.chinese: 世上实无恶劣天气，只有好天气的种种不同罢了。

sentences.english: Imparting family values is a long-term process.
sentences.chinese: 灌输种种家庭观念是一个长期的过程。

sentences.english: He rushed about doing preposterous things in an extraordinary manner.
sentences.chinese: 他奔来奔去，离奇古怪地干下了种种荒谬的事情。

sentences.english: However, because of various reasons, the preparatory process is often a formality.
sentences.chinese: 然而由于种种原因，前置程序往往徒具形式。

sentences.english: She is awaking to the grim realities of life.
sentences.chinese: 她开始意识到生活中的种种严酷现实。

sentences.english: The urban life of high-tempo is permeating with various desire and vainness .
sentences.chinese: 忙碌的都市生活，总是充满了种种的欲望与无奈。

sentences.english: While we, when making a choice, are so full of hesitations and have so many doubts.
sentences.chinese: 而人们在做出种种选择的时候总会参杂着诸多的犹豫。

sentences.english: Owing to a lot of reasons, his many works were not printed and handed down.
sentences.chinese: 由于种种原因，他的许多著述未能刊刻流传。

definition: (used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
things like this (idiom); and so on/and the rest/etc
more and more emerge/innumerable succession/breeding like flies (idiom)
by no means an isolated case/numerous
